title: Admin configuration helper / validator
description:
It would be nice to have an admin page that helps you tune the configuration based on the data in your index.  Specifically, I'd like to see what size caches should be set to facet on given fields.


From Hoss in: http://www.nabble.com/facet-optimizing-tf3187930.html#a8855581

that reminds me of an idea i had way back when for a Solr sanity checker tool that would inspect your schema, index, and logs of sample queries and point out things that didn't seem to make any sense, ie: String fields that don't omitNorms, sorting on a tokenized field, or a non-sortable int/float fields that werre multivalued but didnt' seem like they needed to be (because every doc only had one value) etc...
